channel.title: Official Weekly Event Thread
channel.description:
Yes, I am making it official.
[b]FIRST OFFICIAL EVENT: CHAOS DWARF RAPE[/b]
We are going to the Chaos Dwarf Battlefield in hopes of Loot/Coinsharing a Dragon Pickaxe. Depending on how many people are going, we may be cannoning the fuck out of these things.
[b]You'll need [u]Forgiveness of a Chaos Dwarf[/u] finished before coming.[/b]
Dragon Pickaxe Price: 12.6M as of 5-12-11
[b]TIME & DATE[/b] I'm hoping for this to take place on Saturday. The time is undecided with all of the time zones and such, but I'm hoping to shoot for 7:00PM EST. If we need to, we can probably change it.
This is a drop log for 500 Chaos Dwarf Hand cannoneers: [code]Chaos - 5/9/2011 6:55:42 PM
1. Coins 2. Coins 3. Coins 4. Coins 5. Hand Cannon Shots x100 6. Coins 7. Coins 8. Coins 9. Air Runes 10. Coins 11. Coins 12. Coins 13. Death Rune 14. Coins 15. Coins 16. Steel Full helm 17. Coins 18. Coins 19. Coins 20. Coins 21. Muddy Key 22. Steel Full helm 23. Cosmic Runes 24. Muddy Key 25. Coins 26. Coins 27. Coins 28. Hand Cannon Shots x100 29. Mithril Bar 30. Mithril Bar 31. item.title: Official Weekly Event Thread
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

The quest doesnâ€™t take very long at all actually. All of the necessary quests only take about 2-3 hours to finish, and the quests are pretty good to.
